item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An open discussion forum for ArXiv papers (132 points | 45 comments)
2. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (15 points | 3 comments)
3. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (416 points | 149 comments)
4. Goodbye Tinder, hello Strava: have 'hobby' apps become the new social networks? (15 points | 3 comments)
5. Baiting the bot (70 points | 33 comments)
6. Asking the Wrong Questions (2017) (129 points | 66 comments)
7. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (219 points | 22 comments)
8. Five Geek Social Fallacies (2003) (34 points | 13 comments)
9. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (84 points | 35 comments)
10. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (97 points | 12 comments)
11. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (548 points | 254 comments)
12. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (177 points | 11 comments)
13. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (252 points | 132 comments)
14. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (147 points | 8 comments)
15. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (18 points | 1 comment)
16. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (103 points | 20 comments)
17. LuaJIT PR: Add Support for RISC-V 64 (12 points | 1 comment)
18. Battlestar Galactica: Technical Manual (2005) (37 points | 16 comments)
19. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (15 points | discuss)
20. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (241 points | 145 comments)
21. The "email is authentication" pattern (212 points | 304 comments)
22. WordPerfect for Unix Character Terminals (22 points | 11 comments)
23. The worsening Raspberry Pi RP2350 E9 erratum situation (34 points | 4 comments)
24. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (158 points | 86 comments)
25. The little-known life of the scarfing tool (7 points | 1 comment)
26. Things to know about the Great Wave (230 points | 75 comments)
27. Groups underpin modern math (80 points | 31 comments)
28. Man jailed indefinitely for refusing to decrypt hard drives loses appeal (2011) (8 points | 3 comments)
29. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (98 points | 38 comments)
30. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (137 points | 79 comments)
